channel.title: CVE Feed for WPBlockart -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPBlockart -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35704|2024-06-08T14:12:21.898Z -- wpblockart -- blockart%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPBlockArt BlockArt Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects BlockArt Blocks: from n/a through 2.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-34760|2024-05-16T15:54:54.908Z -- wpblockart -- magazine%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPBlockart Magazine Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Magazine Blocks: from n/a through 1.3.6.
